org.lenskit.util.parallel

Class TaskGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • org.lenskit.util.parallel.TaskGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>

    public class TaskGroup
extends java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction

    A group of tasks to be executed in a fork-join tree.

    See Also:
